entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
